ProductAttribute.name: ProductAttribute
ProductAttribute.description: Represents the attributes that can be associated with a product.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The default value is USD. Possible values are: USDâ€”U.S. Dollar

Name.description: Name of the product attribute set.

ProductId.description: The ID of the product that the attribute is associated with. This field is unique within your organization.

Sequence.description: The order that product attributes appear in.

VariantParentId.description: The ID of the variation parent record associated with the product attribute.
